actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department, Health and Human Services Department, Labor Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Service to provide that the inclusion in gross income of certain amounts of unemployment compensation shall not apply to unemployment compensation which is payable by reason of a work in 1973 but was not paid until 1979.

summary.text: Amends the Revenue Act of 1978 to provide that the inclusion in gross income of certain amounts of unemployment compensation shall not apply to unemployment compensation which was payable for weeks of unemployment ending before December 1, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Service to provide that the inclusion in gross income of certain amounts of unemployment compensation shall not apply to unemployment compensation which is payable by reason of a work in 1973 but was not paid until 1979.
